attributes.action: Maintain The M4 Bus/Taxi lane, and introduce an M4 congestion charge.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The M4 Bus & Taxi lane is a great way to get to Heathrow quicker that cars can. The message - Go by public transport. It is better for the environment, and reduces congestion. If the lane was lost, there would just be another lane of congestion. Introducing a congestion charge for this section of the M4 would reduce traffic, and more people should use public transport.
